articles.title: Journalists Detail Seeing Their Own Spatial Videos on Apple Vision Pro - MacRumors
articles.description: With the launch of iOS 17.2, Apple added a camera feature that allows iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max models to record 3D spatial video that will...
articles.content: With the launch of iOS 17.2, Apple added a camera feature that allows iPhone 15 Pro and ‌iPhone 15 Pro‌ Max models to record 3D spatial video that will be viewable on the Apple Vision Pro when it bec… [+3857 chars]
